# Volatility
## I want to fix irregularities in my dataset

> Don't call the world dirty because you forgot to clean your glasses...\
--- Aaron Hill\

Use this pattern when it is important to obtain a metric of volatility, i.e.~to see where a value changes greatly from previous patterns. There are several methods to measure volatility, such as the close-to-close historical volatilty (CCHV) that differ in sophistication and how they can capture volatility in different data sets.
